full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDOR LEGS PA'I CHAS 'BUL MNGA' GSOL GNYER GTAD DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES DAM CAN SKYE BU CHEN PO'I CHAS 'BUL MNGA' GSOL GNYED GTAD DANG BCAS PA 'DI YANG, RANG GIS SLOB BU BRTZON 'GRUS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I RKYEN GYIS, ,BLA MA DAM PA'I BKA' 'BANGS KYI THA SHAL DED RANG RIG PA'I GNAS LUNG DANG RTOGS PA'I YON TA MA SBYONGS DANG BLO BUL PHRA ZHING 'PHONGS TSUL BZHIN SDOBS SBYOR BKA' GYUR YANG, ,BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHAL GDAMS KYIS BDUD RTZI'I CUNG ZAD MYONG BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,LHA BTZUN BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS THAMS CAD DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
